body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Nancy Anne Duff Eversole. Father of Sarah Eversole, Elizabeth Eversole, Harrison Eversole, Joseph Eversole, George Eversole, Clarkston Eversole, Mary Eversole, Polly Eversole, and John C. Eversole. Farmer in Perry County in 1850. Farmer in Perry County in 1860. Major in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment from February 1863 to March 1864. Killed by guerilla fighters near his home on May 2, 1864.
